so that's really something we wanted to solve the second bucket of of like
problems again hindering folks from moving fast and and building great products was more around just um
maintaining product quality as an organization grows and scales and that it can be really hard to stay on top of
this and our favorite and best tool for this is really design systems we think
that's kind of the the tool most companies employ to kind of scale quality but the problem we heard from a
lot of customers is like yes they have a robust design system but nobody uses it or people use it wrong or or all these
things right so we really wanted to like make sure that these companies who've invested in Design Systems actually like
